- Le discours d'Hitler est page 17.
- Dix-sept, très bien.

translation.en: There we are. Good. Now, there's…
Something has been niggling at me since I read this.
translation.fr:
Quelque chose me taraude
depuis que j'ai lu ça.

translation.en: "We never found a single great power in Europe
translation.fr:
"Nous n'avons rencontré
qu'une seule grande puissance européenne

translation.en: with a man at its head who has as much understanding
translation.fr:
"avec à sa tête, un seul homme
qui ait de la compréhension

translation.en: for the distress of our people
as my great friend Benito Mussolini."
-See what I mean? -Yes.
I'm not sure I do.
If Herr Hitler is not going to listen to me…
…maybe he'll listen to his great friend
translation.fr:
mais il pourrait bien écouter
son grand ami,

translation.en: Benito Mussolini.
Now, Legat, I want you to take this to the cipher room
translation.fr: Legat, portez ceci à la salle du chiffre

translation.en: and have it telegraphed immediately to Jimmy Drummond,
translation.fr:
afin qu'ils le télégraphient immédiatement
à Jimmy Drummond,

translation.en: -our ambassador in Rome. -Yes, Prime Minister.
translation.fr: notre ambassadeur à Rome. Oui, monsieur.

translation.en: Hadn't you better tell the foreign secretary you're writing to the Italians?
translation.fr:
Vous ne devriez pas
en informer le Foreign Office ?

translation.en: Oh, damn the foreign secretary.
Oh, Legat, forget you heard that.
translation.fr: Legat, vous n'avez pas entendu ça.

translation.en: [man 1, in German] Scrub…
Look at them! Watch closely!
This is the place where the Jew belongs.
translation.fr: Voilà à quoi sert un Juif.

translation.en: -[horn beeps] -[man 1] Keep scrubbing!
I said keep scrubbing!
Into the cracks, as well. Keep scrubbing! I said keep scrubbing!
translation.fr:
Dans les fissures aussi.
Continuez à frotter !

translation.en: [man 2] You missed a spot!
Look at him, this Jewish pig!
How his presence ruined the very ground!
translation.fr: Sa seule présence salit le sol !

translation.en: [woman sings in German] ♪ Your soft breath gives solace… ♪
The cracks as well.
Keep scrubbing! I said keep scrubbing!
translation.fr:
Continuez à frotter !
Je t'ai dit de continuer !

translation.en: ♪ In your arms ♪
♪ For hours walking barefoot ♪
translation.fr: Des heures à marcher pieds nus

translation.en: ♪ Over the soft moss ♪
♪ You're silently dreaming ♪
♪ Of strange star signs ♪
♪ The golden locks ♪
♪ Kindled by the moon ♪
♪ I see the longing ♪
♪ But you can't stay… ♪
-Sorry. -Thought you'd got lost.
What?
Very strange to meet you here, Lieutenant Colonel.
translation.fr: C'est étrange de vous rencontrer ici.

translation.en: -I've never seen you out of uniform. -One second.
Andi, three schnapps.
[Andi] Three schnapps, coming right up.
Go ahead.
Everyone was there, all the top-ranking defence generals.
translation.fr:
Tout le monde était là.
Les grands généraux.

translation.en: And they all confirmed again
that there is strong opposition to a war with the Czechs.
translation.fr:
qu'il y a une forte opposition
à la guerre.

translation.en: This is the moment we've been waiting for.
At two o'clock tomorrow, when Hitler gives the order to invade,
translation.fr:
À 14 h demain,
quand Hitler donnera l'ordre d'envahir,

translation.en: the Wehrmacht will step in.
-And the three of us are the key. -What exactly does that mean?
translation.fr:
- Et nous sommes la clé.
- Comment ça ?

translation.en: We go to the Chancellery.
We make sure that all important entry points are clear.
translation.fr:
On s'assure
que les points d'entrée sont dégagés.

translation.en: Then we give the signal to step in, and Hitler will be arrested.
translation.fr:
Puis on donne le signal
pour qu'Hitler soit arrêté.

translation.en: You believe that the Wehrmacht will take action against him?
translation.fr:
Vous croyez
que la Wehrmacht agira contre lui ?

translation.en: War with the Czechs, that's…
That means war with Britain and France.
translation.fr: c'est combattre l'Angleterre et la France.

translation.en: That's crazy! It's the last thing the generals want.
translation.fr:
C'est de la folie.
Les généraux sont contre.

translation.en: Right, Hans. But still, I don't trust the generals.
translation.fr:
Oui, Hans.
Mais je ne leur fais pas confiance.

translation.en: They're not opposed to him.
translation.fr: Ils ne s'opposent pas à lui,

translation.en: They're just opposed to war because they're scared they'll lose it.
translation.fr:
mais à la guerre,
car ils ont peur de la perdre.

translation.en: Is this really the only plan?
[Hans] It's the only plan we have, Erich.
[Erich] It all sounds so incredibly fragile.
Have you ever wondered if we're wrong?
What if we're mistaken?
What if he's right, and he's telling the truth
that he just wants to take back the territories that belong to Germany?
translation.fr:
S'il ne voulait
que les territoires allemands ?

translation.en: -And he'll stop there? -Then leave, Erich.
translation.fr: Et qu'il s'arrête là ? Alors partez.

translation.en: He's a small, vulgar man. Hitler is like a thug.
translation.fr: C'est un petit homme vulgaire. Hitler est un voyou.

translation.en: He only knows his own personal truth. He'll keep taking more and more.
translation.fr:
Il ne connaît que sa vérité.
Il en voudra toujours plus.

translation.en: -More people will get hurt. -How do you know?
translation.fr:
- Il y aura des blessés.
- Tu l'ignores !

translation.en: -He'll never stop! -It's not the time to argue!
-Tomorrow, tomorrow is the day-- -[Andi] Three schnapps.
translation.fr:
- Demain, c'est le jour…
- Trois schnaps.

translation.en: Are you with us, Erich?
Let's assume Hitler gets arrested tomorrow.
What happens then?
We shoot the bastard.
If he doesn't surrender.
Tomorrow at two o'clock, we will hear that mobilisation is beginning.
translation.fr:
Demain, à 14 h, on entendra
le début de la mobilisation.

translation.en: That will be our cue.
Friends, history is watching us.
Sometime tomorrow night,
this whole nightmare will be over.
-♪ I see the longing… ♪ -[sighs]
♪ But you can't stay ♪
translation.fr: Mais tu ne peux pas rester

translation.en: ♪ Come dance through the blue night ♪
translation.fr: Viens danser dans la nuit bleue

translation.en: ♪ With me one more time ♪
-[Winter] What? You want to arrest him? -[Paul] That's the plan, yeah.
translation.fr:
- Vous voulez l'arrêter ?
- C'est le plan.

translation.en: -You think that could work? -Yes.
This Wehrmacht will turn against the boss?
Never. Mark my word. I was married to a general.
translation.fr:
Jamais. Crois-moi.
J'étais mariée à un général.

translation.en: -Your husband was a disloyal arsehole. -Yes, to me, maybe, but never to Hitler.
translation.fr: C'était un con infidèle. Avec moi, jamais avec Hitler.

translation.en: When he mobilises tomorrow, we will stop him.
translation.fr:
Il lancera la mobilisation
et on l'arrêtera.

translation.en: -You want him to mobilise? -Yes, damn it!
translation.fr:
- Tu veux qu'il le fasse ?
- Oui !

translation.en: [whispers] If he doesn't go to war, you can't stop him.
translation.fr: Sans la guerre, vous ne pouvez rien faire.

translation.en: But, Paul, that means you need this war. That's totally perverse.
translation.fr: Vous en avez besoin. C'est irrationnel.

translation.en: Of course that's perverse, Helen. Without a crime, there can be no arrest.
translation.fr:
Évidemment, Helen.
Pas de crime, pas d'arrestation.

translation.en: What?
I'm considering if I should trust you.
-You've already trusted me. -This is something different.
translation.fr:
- Tu m'as déjà fait confiance.
- C'est différent.

translation.en: What is it?
FOREIGN OFFICE POLITICAL DEPARTMENT
What's this?
I got it from the Foreign Office. I took it today.
translation.fr:
Je l'ai eu au ministère
des Affaires étrangères.

translation.en: What's this?
This is his true plan for Europe.
translation.fr: C'est son vrai plan pour l'Europe.

translation.en: PROTOCOL OF THE MEETING IN THE CHANCELLERY ON NOVEMBER 5, 1937
translation.fr:
PROTOCOLE DE LA RÉUNION À LA CHANCELLERIE
DU 5 NOVEMBRE 1937

translation.en: They'll arrest you for this.
I'm aware.
-This is appalling. -What are you going to do with it?
translation.fr:
- C'est effroyable.
- Tu vas faire quoi ?

translation.en: What are you going to do with it?
Come in.
Letting you know I'll be upstairs, sir. If you need me.
translation.fr: Je serai en haut si vous avez besoin.

translation.en: Righto. Oh, you're on tonight, are you?
translation.fr: Très bien. Vous êtes de service ce soir ?

translation.en: Yes, sir. I'm here till the morning.
Oh, good. Any reply from Rome?
Not yet, sir.
But, you know, it wasn't built in a day.
translation.fr: Mais elle ne s'est pas faite en un jour.

translation.en: Far as I can see, they haven't finished it yet. [chuckles]
translation.fr: Ils ne l'ont même jamais finie.

translation.en: Are you an Oxford man? Yes, Prime Minister.
translation.fr:
- Vous avez étudié à Oxford ?
- Oui, monsieur.

translation.en: Aah. Come on in. Close the door a minute.
Terribly draughty, this place.
translation.fr: Il y a plein de courants d'air.

translation.en: -What did you read at Oxford? -German.
Did they teach you to write English as well?
[laughs] Well, they did their best.
I was more of a talker than a writer, though, sir. Debating was my thing.
translation.fr:
Je parlais plus que je n'écrivais.
J'aimais les débats.

translation.en: -Debating? -Yes, sir.
Well, you've come to the right place.
It's all anybody seems to do here is to debate.
translation.fr: Tout ce qu'on fait ici, c'est débattre.

translation.en: Listen, I've got something I'm going to ask you to do.
It's a little bit impertinent, but this is my speech for tomorrow to the House.
translation.fr:
C'est un peu impertinent,
mais c'est mon discours à la Chambre.

translation.en: But I-- I feel somehow it doesn't flow,
translation.fr: Mais je ne le trouve pas très fluide.

translation.en: and maybe-- maybe an Oxford man,
who… who debates and… and reads German,
translation.fr: qui aime les débats et lit l'allemand,

translation.en: might be able to improve it a little.
-Would you mind? -Of course, Prime Minister.
Thank you so much.
-Very good. Good night. -Good night, sir.
-Make sure you got your camera. -Ready?
Nothing from Rome, Prime Minister.
Still early. Just have to be patient and wait.
translation.fr:
Il est encore tôt.
Il faut être patient et attendre.

translation.en: Do you know,
I'd gladly stand against that wall and be shot if it prevented war.
translation.fr:
je me ferais bien fusiller contre ce mur
si cela pouvait empêcher la guerre.

translation.en: Come here.
I wish you wouldn't say things like that.
translation.fr: Ne dites pas ce genre de choses.

translation.en: -Hmm. -At least not before lunch.
Of course, you were too young to serve in the Great War, Legat.
translation.fr:
Vous étiez trop jeune
pendant la Grande Guerre.

translation.en: And I was too old.
Somehow, that made things worse.
It is absolute agony to…
see such suffering and…
feel so powerless.
Now every time I…
pass a war memorial or…
translation.fr: passe devant un monument aux morts ou…

translation.en: visit one of those vast cemeteries in France,
translation.fr:
que je visite
un de ces cimetières en France,

translation.en: where so many of my friends lie buried,
I vow that if I find myself in the position
translation.fr:
je jure que si jamais
je me trouve en position

translation.en: where I could prevent such a catastrophe from happening again,
translation.fr:
de pouvoir empêcher
qu'une telle horreur se reproduise,

translation.en: I shall do anything…
sacrifice anything…
to maintain the peace.
This is sacred to me.
I understand.
Ah, it's not that we're militarily unprepared for war.
translation.fr:
Ce n'est pas
qu'on n'est pas prêts militairement.

translation.en: That can be remedied, is being remedied.
translation.fr: On peut y remédier. Nous y remédions.

translation.en: It's-- it is rather that I… I fear for the spiritual wellbeing of our people
translation.fr:
C'est plutôt que je crains
pour la santé spirituelle de notre nation

translation.en: if they don't see their leaders doing everything, absolutely everything,
translation.fr:
si ses dirigeants ne font pas
tout ce qu'ils peuvent

translation.en: to prevent another conflict.
'Cause of one thing, I'm certain.
If it comes,
the next war will be infinitely worse than the last.
translation.fr:
la prochaine guerre
sera infiniment pire que la dernière.

translation.en: And they will need even greater fortitude to survive it.
translation.fr:
Et il faudra beaucoup de force d'âme
pour y survivre.

translation.en: -Neville. -No.
Oh, it's all right. It's all right.
[kisses] Come on. Let's go in.
This is Joan, Mr. Legat. She's our fastest.
translation.fr:
Voici Joan, M. Legat.
C'est la plus rapide.

translation.en: Joan, stop what you're doing now.
Mr. Legat needs you to type up the PM's speech for the House.
translation.fr:
M. Legat a besoin
que vous tapiez le discours du PM.

translation.en: -Of course. -Thank you.
-Thank you for doing this so quickly. -You're most welcome.
translation.fr:
- Merci de faire ça aussi vite.
- Mais de rien.

translation.en: If you could make four copies, please.
These notes in red, these amendments, if you can put them in where they are.

Si vous pouviez mettre les notes en rouge
au même endroit.

translation.en: Absolutely, thank you.
Uh, could you, um… stand a little further away, please?
translation.fr: Vous pourriez vous reculer un peu ?

translation.en: Right, sorry.
Sorry, Miss, um…
Joan will be sufficient.
And if you want to know where I'm from…
-[Hugh] I-- -…the answer is Nottingham.
-[knocking at door] -Yes?
-Sorry for my delay, sir. -Ah! Legat, good, good.
translation.fr: Désolé pour le retard. Legat. Bien.

translation.en: Now, we can't risk losing the connection to Berlin.
translation.fr:
On ne peut pas risquer
de perdre la connexion avec Berlin.

translation.en: Syers has the line to Rome, so I want you to sit here…
translation.fr:
Syers est en ligne avec Rome.
Installez-vous donc ici…

translation.en: Bring that chair over.
…and keep the line open and listen out for news.
translation.fr: Gardez la ligne et guettez les nouvelles.

translation.en: -Do you think you can manage that? -Of course, sir.
translation.fr:
- Vous pensez y arriver ?
- Bien sûr.

translation.en: What exactly am I listening for?
To see whether Mussolini's intervened.
The PM needs to know before he addresses the House.
translation.fr:
Le PM doit le savoir
avant de s'adresser à la Chambre.

translation.en: Things are getting tight.
-Yes. That is painfully obvious. -[door opens]
translation.fr: Oui, c'est le moins qu'on puisse dire.

translation.en: -Anything? -Not yet.
-I'm afraid we do need to leave now, sir. -Yes.
-You address the House in ten minutes. -Yes, I know.
translation.fr: Les débats commencent dans dix minutes.

translation.en: -Nothing? -Nothing, sir.
-The line's open? -The line's open. No reply.
translation.fr:
- La ligne fonctionne ?
- Oui. Pas de réponse.

translation.en: -Sir. -Yes.
Yes, all right!
If news comes once the PM is speaking, Legat,
translation.fr:
S'il y a du nouveau
pendant le discours du PM,

translation.en: -bring it to the chamber immediately. -Yes, sir.
-Is Anne here? -She's gone on ahead.
She'll be in the gallery, as will I.
translation.fr: Elle sera dans la galerie. Moi aussi.

translation.en: -Your hat, sir. -Thank you so much.
-God bless you, Mr. Chamberlain! -[man] Mr. Chamberlain!
translation.fr:
- Que Dieu vous bénisse, M. Chamberlain !
- M. Chamberlain !

translation.en: Good luck, sir.
We're all behind you. God bless you.
translation.fr: On vous soutient. Dieu vous bénisse.

translation.en: -Hello? -[man] This is the ambassador.
Mr. Henderson, this is Hugh Legat, the prime minister's private secretary.
translation.fr:
Ici le secrétaire particulier
du Premier ministre.

translation.en: I just returned from Herr Hitler. Where's the PM?
translation.fr:
Je viens de voir Herr Hitler.
Où est le Premier ministre ?

translation.en: [Chamberlain] For His Majesty's Government,
there were three alternative courses
that might have been adopted.
Either we could have threatened to go to war with Germany
translation.fr:
Nous aurions pu menacer
d'entrer en guerre avec l'Allemagne

translation.en: if it attacked Czechoslovakia,
or we could have stood aside and allowed matters to take their course.
translation.fr:
ou nous aurions pu ne rien faire
et laisser les choses suivre leur cours.

translation.en: Or finally, we could attempt
a peaceful settlement by way of mediation.
translation.fr:
d'aboutir à un accord pacifique
par la médiation.

translation.en: [MPs] Hear, hear.
I know very well that I have opened myself to criticism
translation.fr:
Je sais très bien
que je suis exposé aux critiques.

translation.en: -on the grounds that I was detracting… -It's a message from Berlin.
translation.fr:
- On me reproche…
- Un message de Berlin !

translation.en: [Chamberlain] …from the dignity of a British prime minister,
translation.fr:
… de porter atteinte à la dignité
du Premier ministre britannique

translation.en: and to disappointment
and perhaps even resentment…
translation.fr: Il y a peut-être aussi du ressentiment

translation.en: -[murmuring] …if I failed to deliver a satisfactory agreement.
translation.fr:
si je ne parviens pas
à aboutir à un accord satisfaisant.

translation.en: I am…
able to report to the House
translation.fr: en mesure d'annoncer à la Chambre

translation.en: that I have just received news from Berlin
translation.fr:
que je viens de recevoir
des nouvelles de Berlin.

translation.en: that Herr Hitler
has postponed mobilisation.
Furthermore,
-he has invited me… -[man] Very well done, Prime Minister!
…along with Signor Mussolini
and the prime minister of France, Monsieur Daladier,
translation.fr:
et le Premier ministre français,
M. Daladier,

translation.en: -to meet him in Munich tomorrow… -[knocking at door]
translation.fr: à le rencontrer demain à Munich

translation.en: …to resolve the Sudetenland issue.
translation.fr: pour résoudre le problème des Sudètes.

translation.en: [in German] Gentlemen.
-Is it starting? -[sighs]
Mussolini talked Hitler into a conference with Chamberlain and Daladier.
translation.fr:
Mussolini a convaincu Hitler
de rencontrer Chamberlain et Daladier.

translation.en: Tomorrow in Munich.
They're going to sacrifice the Sudetenland to prevent war.
-Damn it! -They're doing exactly what he wants.
translation.fr:
- Bon sang !
- Ils font ce qu'il veut.

translation.en: -Will the Wehrmacht move against him? -We can forget about that.
translation.fr:
- Et la Wehrmacht ?
- On peut l'oublier.

translation.en: -Not a chance. -So this is it?
-God damn it! -Honestly, please.
Pardon me.
What do the gentlemen plan on doing?
It's as good as decided. A conference like this is a formality.
translation.fr:
C'est presque décidé.
Cette conférence n'est qu'une formalité.

translation.en: You need to find a way to meet Chamberlain.
You have to prevent this agreement from being made.
Thank God you can still laugh.
Show him the proof.
-What proof? -That Hitler is bent on a war of conquest.
translation.fr:
- Quoi ?
- Hitler veut une guerre de conquête.

translation.en: I am in possession of a document.
What kind of document?
[Paul] Trust me, please.
-Paul. -Can I just…
Just a moment…
Hugh Legat is one of Chamberlain's secretaries.
translation.fr:
Hugh Legat est
un secrétaire de Chamberlain.

translation.en: Can you arrange for him to come to Munich? That he's part of the English delegation?
translation.fr:
Pouvez-vous le faire venir à Munich ?
Avec la délégation anglaise ?

translation.en: Possibly, yes.
-Will he be expecting-- -No.
But he will help us.
All right.
Right, I'll do what I can.
translation.fr: Bien. Je ferai ce que je peux.

translation.en: Gentlemen.
And can you get Paul into the conference?
translation.fr: Paul doit aller à la conférence.

translation.en: I'll try and add you as an interpreter.
I have to get back.
What's happening here?
Do you think you can smuggle illegal documents into an international conference
translation.fr:
Tu veux glisser des documents illégaux
à une conférence internationale

translation.en: and have a secret meeting with the British prime minister,
translation.fr:
et voir le Premier ministre britannique
en secret

translation.en: right under the Führer's nose?
-Yes. -[laughs]
Oh, Paul?
Then you should have this with you.
Ever used one?
-As children, we used to shoot rabbits. -[both laugh]
This is different.
The principle's the same, right?
translation.fr: Le principe est le même, non ?

translation.en: Thanks.
[in English] Sir Alexander? I got a message you wanted to see me.
translation.fr: Sir Alexander ? Vous vouliez me voir ?

translation.en: [Cadogan] Ah, Legat. Yes.
Close the door.
What's this about, sir?
[Cadogan] This is Colonel Menzies from MI6.
translation.fr:
Je vous présente
le colonel Menzies du MI6.

translation.en: -Colonel? -Good evening.
I believe the name Paul von Hartmann is known to you?
translation.fr:
Le nom de Paul von Hartmann
ne vous est pas inconnu ?

translation.en: [Cadogan] Legat?
Yes.
Yes, sir. We were at Oxford together.
translation.fr: Oui. Nous étions à Oxford ensemble.

translation.en: When did you last see him?
Uh, the summer of '32. I visited him in Munich.
translation.fr:
En été 32.
Je lui ai rendu visite à Munich.

translation.en: All roads lead to Munich.
translation.fr: Toutes les routes mènent à Munich.

translation.en: -Any contact since? -No.
-Why not? -We had a disagreement.
translation.fr:
- Pourquoi ?
- On a eu un différend.

translation.en: -What about? -Politics.
And you haven't communicated since?
No, sir.
We're sorry about the questions, Legat,
but we need to understand what sort of relationship you have,
translation.fr:
mais nous devons comprendre
quel genre de relation vous avez,

translation.en: or had, with this particular German.
translation.fr: ou aviez, avec ce ressortissant allemand.

translation.en: It seems your friend is part of the secret opposition to Hitler.
translation.fr:
Il semble que votre ami travaille
aux côtés des opposants à Hitler.

translation.en: His position inside the Foreign Ministry gives him access to classified material.
translation.fr:
Son poste au ministère
lui donne accès à des documents secrets.

translation.en: Material he's willing to share with us.
Or, more specifically, with you.
How do you feel about that?
Surprised.
[Cadogan] But…
are you willing to take matters further?

translation.en: I don't understand.
He has a document in his possession,
translation.fr: Il a un document en sa possession

translation.en: and we'd very much like to know what it is.
translation.fr: et nous aimerions savoir ce que c'est.

translation.en: We'd like you to go to Munich tomorrow,

translation.en: meet with von Hartmann, and get the document.
translation.fr:
pour le rencontrer
et récupérer le document.

translation.en: I beg your pardon?
It's not without risk.
Technically, it'll be an act of espionage on foreign soil.
translation.fr:
Techniquement, ce sera
un acte d'espionnage sur sol étranger.

translation.en: This kind of thing, sir, I--
translation.fr: Pour ce genre de choses, monsieur, je ne…

translation.en: -I'm not really-- -No one is at first, but you'll do fine.
translation.fr: Pour ce genre de choses, monsieur, je ne… C'est normal au début, mais ça ira.

translation.en: Duty calls, Legat.
-I'm not sure how Cleverly will feel-- -[Cadogan] Leave Cleverly to us.
translation.fr:
- J'ignore ce que Cleverly…
- On s'en occupe.

translation.en: Absolutely. We know Oscar.
And the PM doesn't need to know.
translation.fr:
Et il est préférable
que le PM ne sache rien.

translation.en: Well.
Good luck, Legat.
[man] The German Reich! Vote for the German Reich!
translation.fr:
Le Reich allemand !
Votez pour le Reich allemand !

translation.en: Which government is in the right? The answer is…

Quel gouvernement a raison ?
La réponse…

translation.en: Cast your pivotal vote!
[in English] I was recommended a bar called "Hubers."
translation.fr:
- On m'a conseillé un bar, le Hubers.
- Oui, on le connaît.

translation.en: -Yeah, we know it. -Yeah, we know it.

- On m'a conseillé un bar, le Hubers.
- Oui, on le connaît. - Oui.
- Quoi ?

translation.en: -What? -We know Hubers.
-Great! -Not great.
translation.fr:
- On le connaît.
- Super ! Pas super.

translation.en: -[man shouting in German] -[in English] Yes, great. Ah!
The beer's cheap, and apparently, they have live music.
translation.fr:
La bière coûte rien
et il y a de la musique.

translation.en: Believe me, the music there is awful.
Awful music is my favourite kind of music.
-Mine too. Paul. -Yeah. See?
[in German] It's his vacation. He's the guest.
[in English] Hugh gets to choose.
-Hubers. -Hubers.
[in German] Thirsty!
[Hugh, in English] You can go there. There is one. He took coffee there.
translation.fr: On peut y aller. Il y a pris un café.

translation.en: It's on my little list, which you all made fun of.
translation.fr: C'est sur ma liste dont vous vous moquez.

translation.en: I don't want to go to this-- this rally.
translation.fr: Je ne veux pas aller au rassemblement.

translation.en: Yeah, but I want to go to the rally.
translation.fr: Oui, mais moi, je veux y aller.

translation.en: -[in German] You're not going there. -Pardon?
-You're too drunk, Lena. -I see. I'm too drunk.
translation.fr: Tu es soûle, Lena. Je vois. Je suis soûle.

translation.en: -I'm going. -Well, I won't come. Not with you two.
translation.fr: J'y vais. Je n'y vais pas. Pas avec vous.

translation.en: Okay, then don't.
-[in English] Hugh will come. -[sighs]
Do I have to go?
You have to actually see the man.
If he's so ridiculous, why not just ignore him?
translation.fr: S'il est ridicule, il faut l'ignorer.

translation.en: Ignore him? We cannot ignore him. He's dangerous!
translation.fr: On ne peut pas. Il est dangereux !

translation.en: -No, but this is fuelling the fire, Lena. -He's--
translation.fr: Mais ça attise le feu. Il veut attirer l'attention.

translation.en: -This is what he wants. Attention. -He's talking about things that matter!
translation.fr: Il veut attirer l'attention. Il parle de choses importantes !

translation.en: -Oh, come on, Paul. -There's a reason people attend rallies.
-Paul, he's a bigot and a pervert. -Exactly.
translation.fr:
- C'est un fanatique et un pervers.
- Oui.

translation.en: The people of a whole country forgot about what makes them as a nation,
translation.fr:
Le peuple a oublié
ce qui fait de lui une nation.

translation.en: and now that there is someone to lead them
and to remind them of their nation's greatness--
translation.fr: et lui rappeler la grandeur de sa nation…

translation.en: I don't understand how anyone can vote for this man.
Voting for Hitler is not voting against Jews.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas voter contre les Juifs.

translation.en: -Not against Jews? -It's voting-- No!
-It's voting for the future. -The future?
-[Lena] For the future? -Yes! Yes!
-What future? -I'll show you!
[in German] You lot, hey! Can I ask you something?
-What? -What do you want?
-Who are you going to vote for? -Why?
What do you think of Hitler?
Hitler makes us proud to be German again!
translation.fr: Hitler nous rend fiers d'être allemands !

translation.en: -Thank you! Thank you very much. -Who are you lot going to vote for?
translation.fr:
- Merci !
- Vous allez voter pour qui ?

translation.en: -[man] Hitler! -Thank you.
[in English] See? The future.
[all cheering] Yes!
[in English] Now, Paul, you have to be careful, because people are scared.
translation.fr:
Paul, tu dois faire attention,
car les gens ont peur.

translation.en: Yes, scared of change.
translation.fr: Oui, ils ont peur du changement.

translation.en: [in German] Paul, people are leaving the country.
translation.fr: Paul. Les gens quittent le pays.

translation.en: Families are getting on boats to America.
If that's what they decide, they are free to do so.
-They don't just decide like that! -Bullshit!
translation.fr:
- Ils n'ont pas le choix !
- Tu parles !

translation.en: People don't want to live here any more.
translation.fr: Ils ne veulent plus vivre ici.

translation.en: They are scared to live in this country. That's not just bullshit!
translation.fr:
Ils ont peur de vivre ici.
Ce n'est pas n'importe quoi !

translation.en: [in English] The Germany you're speaking of is being built
translation.fr: Ton Allemagne est bâtie sur la souffrance

translation.en: upon the suffering of other people.
translation.fr: Ton Allemagne est bâtie sur la souffrance des autres.

translation.en: You're one to talk about exploiting others,
-Englishman. -Oh, all right.
translation.fr: L'exploitation, ça te connaît, l'Anglais. D'accord.

translation.en: I take it. I'm a hypocrite. But I know fanaticism when I see it.
translation.fr:
Je suis un hypocrite.
Mais je reconnais le fanatisme.

translation.en: [in German] Fa-na-ti-cal.
[in English] You think I'm a fanatic?
I think he's a fanatic,
translation.fr: C'est un fanatique et tu le défends.

translation.en: -and you are defending him. -You sound like him.
translation.fr:
C'est un fanatique et tu le défends. - Tu t'entends ?
- Ta gueule !

translation.en: [in German] Fuck you!
-[in English] Hey! -What? You want to say something to me?
-I don't like you speaking like that. -I don't like you talking as if you knew
translation.fr:
Ne parle pas comme ça. Et toi, ne parle pas
de ce que tu ne connais pas !

translation.en: -what any of this feels like! -I don't think you understand
translation.fr:
Et toi, ne parle pas
de ce que tu ne connais pas ! Je ne crois pas que tu comprennes…

translation.en: -this feeling you're-- -No, no, no.
translation.fr: Je ne crois pas que tu comprennes…

translation.en: You don't understand anything about me or about Germany!
translation.fr:
Non ! Tu ne connais rien de moi
ni de l'Allemagne !

translation.en: -[speaking German] -You never for a second ever forget your triumph!
-[man 1, in German] Be quiet! -[man 2] Exactly!
You're talking down to me like a child. I'm supposed to be grateful for that?
translation.fr:
Tu me parles comme à un enfant.
Je devrais être reconnaissant ?

translation.en: I'm sick of being grateful! And I'm sick of you too.
translation.fr:
J'en ai marre de l'être !
Et j'en ai marre de toi.

translation.en: Pau--
-[clears throat] -[in English] I'm-- I'm so sorry.
You don't have to be sorry.
[sighs] I don't-- I don't understand this.
We always used to enjoy provoking each other. It--
It was fun, but this is-- this is different. I've not seen him like that.
translation.fr:
Mais là, c'est différent.
Je ne l'avais jamais vu comme ça.

translation.en: [sniffling] Me neither.
[sobs] I mean…
Shall we…
see some bigots and perverts?
translation.fr: de voir des fanatiques et des pervers ?

translation.en: Yes.
-Heil Hitler. -Heil Hitler.
-[in German] Well? -Here are your papers.
They barely got you on the list.
translation.fr: T'as été mis de justesse sur la liste.

translation.en: Ready?
Are you coming?
Someone needs to make sure you don't do anything stupid.
translation.fr:
On doit s'assurer
que tu ne feras pas de bêtise.

translation.en: Go, hurry. See you in Munich.
EMIGRATE! GO TO JERUSALEM!
This is your compartment.
Thank you.
-[man 1] Cramped but cosy, huh? -[man 2] Yeah!
[man 1] Helmut, no visits from women.
translation.fr: Helmut, pas de visites de femmes.

translation.en: [Helmut] Of course, you know me.
[man 1] This is me.
-There's someone in there already. Hello? -[Paul] Yes.
translation.fr:
- Il y a quelqu'un. Pardon ?
- Oui.

translation.en: Paulie?
Hello, Franz.
What are you doing here?
It seems they need my help…
translation.fr: Ils ont besoin de mon aide.

translation.en: -I see. -…with interpreting.
-No one told me. -Yes, it was a last-minute decision.
translation.fr:
- On m'a rien dit.
- Je l'ai su à la dernière minute.

translation.en: -Is this your bunk? -Yes.
Then we're roommates.
Yeah.
Like in the old days.
-Like in the old days! -Yeah, excellent!
translation.fr:
- Comme au bon vieux temps.
- Oui !

translation.en: -Excellent, right? -Excellent.
Great.
-Okay, may I? One second. -Yeah.
-See you in a bit, I… -See you.
Thank you, Legat.
[man] Prime Minister, don't let us go to war again.
-[man] Good luck, sir. -Nice of you. I'll make sure we don't.
translation.fr: C'est très gentil. Je vais m'en assurer.

translation.en: -[woman] Sir, you can really do this. -Good morning.
-We should board, Prime Minister. -Thank you very much.
-Give us a statement! -[Wilson] Prime Minister?
Sir?
Prime Minister, please.
-Thank you. -Thank you. That's enough.
-[Chamberlain] I'm going to say a word. -[Wilson] We should board now, sir.
translation.fr:
- Je vais dire un mot.
- Nous devons monter.

translation.en: [clears throat] When I was a boy,
I used to repeat,
"If at first you don't succeed,
translation.fr: "Si tu ne réussis pas du premier coup,

translation.en: try, try, try again."
And that's what I'm doing now.
translation.fr: Et c'est ce que je fais.

translation.en: -[cheering] -[man] Good luck, Mr. Chamberlain!
-[in German] You caught me. -Can I assist you?
translation.fr: Pris la main dans le sac. Je peux t'aider ?

translation.en: I know it looks bad, but it's nothing personal.
We all have our orders.
I'm relieved to be able to tell you that everything is in order.
translation.fr:
Je suis soulagé de te dire
que tout est en ordre.

translation.en: You can put it back now.
Thank you so much.
Come on, Paulie. Are you cross now?
Do I hear you being cross now? Is Paulie cross?
translation.fr:
J'entends que tu es fâché.
Paulie est fâché ?

translation.en: Cross little Paulie!
Paulie, come on!
Defend yourself!
Come on, defend yourself!
-Von Hartmann? -I am.
Dr. Schmidt. Head of translation. Do you have a moment?
translation.fr:
Dr Schmidt. Chef de la traduction.
Je peux ?

translation.en: -Of course. -I'm very pleased to meet you.
translation.fr:
- Oui.
- Je suis ravi de vous voir.

translation.en: I'm relieved I don't have to do all of it by myself.
translation.fr:
Je suis soulagé
de ne pas avoir à tout faire.

translation.en: When we arrive in Munich, I will handle the Führer, the Duce,
translation.fr:
À Munich,
je m'occuperai du Führer, du Duce,

translation.en: the Prime Minister, and the Président du Conseil.
translation.fr: du PM et du président du conseil.

translation.en: And you can deal with the smaller stuff.
What other languages do you speak?
[in each language] French, Italian, and a little, really just a little bit of Ru…
translation.fr:
Français, italien, et un peu,
vraiment un tout petit peu de Ru…

translation.en: [in German] The Russians aren't invited, and neither are the Czechs.
translation.fr:
Les Russes et les Tchèques
ne sont pas invités.

translation.en: Don't worry. I'll brief you on the details later.
Right now, the Führer is waiting for his foreign press summary.
translation.fr:
Le Führer attend
le compte rendu de la presse étrangère.

translation.en: Can you take care of that?
-Right now? -Yes, right now.
What do I have to do? Look him in the eye.
translation.fr:
- Que dois-je faire ?
- Regardez-le dans les yeux.

translation.en: Don't speak unless you're spoken to directly.
translation.fr: Ne parlez que s'il s'adresse à vous.

translation.en: And don't smell of smoke.
If you stink of smoke, he'll throw you out.
translation.fr:
Si vous sentez le tabac,
il vous fera sortir.

translation.en: -Heil Hitler. -Heil Hitler.
Von Hartmann, press summary for the Führer.
translation.fr: Le résumé de la presse étrangère.

translation.en: Who wrote this?
That's the editorial in the London Times, my Führer.
translation.fr:
C'est l'éditorial

translation.en: Have you spent time in England?
I was at Oxford for two years.
I can hear that.
Von Hartmann.
You're ambitious. Good.
You're intelligent. Good.
Maybe you think you're more intelligent than me?
translation.fr: Vous croyez l'être plus que moi ?

translation.en: -I-- -I can read people.
The way professors at those universities read books.
translation.fr:
La façon dont ces professeurs
lisent les livres.

translation.en: Oxford.
I see who you are.
Do you see me?
Yes, my Führer.
You know the English. What are they thinking?
translation.fr:
Vous connaissez les Anglais.
Que pensent-ils ?

translation.en: They underestimate you. Correct.
The maps, my Führer.
The new course for the border.
We have 40 divisions to destroy the Czechs with.
translation.fr:
Quarante divisions
pour abattre les Tchèques.

translation.en: We could have it done within a week.
translation.fr: On pourrait le faire en une semaine.

translation.en: Yes, my Führer.
The train is heading in the wrong direction.

translation.en: Why these detours?
Good, thank you.
PEACE IN EUROPE
WELCOME CHAMBERLAIN
-[Chamberlain, in English] Look at this. -Would you care for something to drink?
translation.fr:
- Regardez-moi ça.
- Je vous sers quelque chose ?

translation.fr: Oui. Un petit whisky à l'eau.

translation.en: [man, in German] Welcome.
-[in English] A great pleasure. -[man] Our friend Hermann Göring.
[in German] Hello.
Welcome. Pardon me.
[in English] Good morning.
-[in German] Welcome. -Hello.
Attention!
We'll talk upstairs. Tell him that.
Just the four of us. You and one advisor each.
Yes, my Führer.
Thank you.
[man 1] …saw him carry himself with confidence.
translation.fr:
- Il se tenait avec assurance.
- En effet.

translation.en: -[man 2] Indeed. -I'll go give him the rest.

- Il se tenait avec assurance.
- En effet. Je donne le reste.

translation.en: I require a watch. Lend me yours, please.
He apparently thinks he won't get it back. He thinks the Führer is a watch thief.

Il a peur de ne pas la récupérer.
Le Führer n'est pas un voleur.

translation.en: He thinks he's one of the clever ones.
Well, let's get it over with.
[Schmidt] Very well, sir.
[in English] Rather too strong, this. I need to-- Ah.
[Schmidt] Excuse me, Your Excellencies.
Prime Minister, Monsieur le Président du Conseil.
The Führer invites you to join him in the library…
translation.fr:
Le Führer vous invite
à le rejoindre dans la bibliothèque

translation.en: -Very good. Come along. -…in order to begin the talks.
He suggests leaders and one advisor only.
translation.fr:
Il suggère les dirigeants
avec un conseiller chacun.

translation.en: Well. Sorry, Henderson. Horace, looks it better be you.
translation.fr:
Eh bien. Désolé, Henderson.
Horace, nous y allons.

translation.en: [in German] Well, please excuse me a moment.
It was a mistake not to insist on the Czechs being in the negotiations.
translation.fr:
C'est une erreur
de ne pas avoir invité les Tchèques.

translation.en: They're carving up the damn country, and there's no one--
translation.fr:
Ils découpent le pays
et il n'y a personne…

translation.fr:
Arrêtez de gigoter, M. Legat
ou il ne restera plus rien de la chaise.

translation.en: -Hello. -Yes, this is Cleverly.
-Sir, it's Legat. -Yes. Where's the PM?
translation.fr:
- C'est Legat.
- Oui. Où est le PM ?

translation.en: Everyone's been at the conference for about an hour now, sir.
translation.fr: Il est à la conférence depuis une heure.

translation.en: Good, good, good.
Sir Horace asked me to stay here, but I feel I'd be more--
translation.fr:
Sir Horace m'a demandé
de rester ici, mais je…

translation.en: Make sure this line remains open.
With respect, I feel I'd be more useful to the PM if I was at the conference.
translation.fr:
Avec tout mon respect,
je serais plus utile à la conférence.

translation.en: Just do your job, Legat.
But having come all of this way--
Absolutely not!
You stay exactly where you are.
Hello? Sir? Sir?
-[click] -Hello?
If London calls again,
I can always tell them you're busy with the hotel manager.
translation.fr:
je dirai que vous êtes
avec le directeur de l'hôtel.

translation.en: They'll believe that, I'm sure.
Go.
-[in German] Oh, sorry! -Watch it!
Your ID, please.
Excuse me. Sir Neville?
-Yes. -I'm Hugh Legat.
Ah, Legat. Yes, of course. What are you doing here?
translation.fr:
Legat. Oui, bien sûr.
Que faites-vous ici ?

translation.en: I had a couple of queries from London.
Is Sir Horace in?
No. No, he's with the PM and the other leaders.
translation.fr:
Il est avec le PM
et les autres dirigeants.

translation.en: Is there anything you can tell me?
[sighs] Nothing pressing.
[in German] Hartmann, have you noticed how often Göring changed outfits today?
translation.fr:
Vous avez remarqué
combien de fois Göring a changé de tenue ?

translation.en: This is the third uniform I've seen him wear today.

translation.en: But don't let that-- Oh, there's Schmidt. He needs you.

Ne laissez pas ça…
Schmidt a besoin de vous.

translation.en: Fetch François-Poncet and Henderson. Quickly, please.
-[in English] How's it going? -Haven't a clue.
[in French] Mr. Ambassador.
-[in English] Would you like some tea? -Thank you.
Tea, if you'd be so kind.
[woman, in German] Right away.

Votre Excellence, les dirigeants

translation.en: At last.
[in German] I… Follow me without anyone seeing.
translation.fr: Je… Suis-moi sans que personne ne te voie.

translation.en: [in English] Where the hell are you going?

translation.en: -Do you happen to have the time? -No. I'm sorry.
Thanks anyway.
[in English] Damn it.
-[in English] Were you followed? -I don't know.
translation.fr:
- On t'a suivi ?
- Je ne sais pas.

translation.en: I'm not used to this sort of thing.
Welcome to the New Germany, Hugh.
Are we safe?
As safe as anywhere.
It's fine. I'll order beers. We'll drink them.

Je vais commander des bières.
On va les boire.

On écoutera la musique

translation.en: [in German] Excuse me. Some beer? Two pale lagers.

Yes.
Happily?
So-so.
What about you?
No.
You're turning grey.

translation.en: Where's Lena?
We don't speak any more.
My pleasure. Cheers.
Hugh, we both, you and I,
translation.fr: Hugh, nous sommes les seuls, toi et moi,

They're going to make a deal. Tomorrow or the day after.
translation.fr:
Ils vont passer un accord.
Demain ou après-demain.

translation.en: I know. That's the problem.

translation.en: Why?

Si un accord est passé,
Hitler sera plus puissant.

translation.en: We're preventing a war. No, you're not. You're not!

- On évite la guerre.
- Non, c'est faux. Pas du tout.

C'est affreux pour les Tchèques
de perdre ces territoires,

tens of thousands of innocent people will die.
Yes. And if we don't invade tomorrow, then soon maybe millions will die.

Oui. Et si on n'envahit pas demain,

translation.en: Millions.
You have no idea who he is.
If you did, none of you would be here.

A meeting with Chamberlain.
Tonight.
Help me. Hugh. You're his secretary. Secretaries arrange meetings.

Aide-moi. Tu es son secrétaire.
Un secrétaire organise des rendez-vous.

It's impossible. And what do you want to tell him?

C'est impossible.
Que veux-tu lui dire ?

[in English] That Hitler is a terrible man?
[in German] Trust me, he knows.
[whispers] I can prove it.
Is that amusing to you?
I'd forgotten what you're like.

Je ne peux pas t'arranger

translation.en: But if you have information we should know about,

Mais si tu as des informations
que nous devrions connaître,

je peux m'arranger

I can try.
Yes.

-Yes. -Thank you very much.

si tu as besoin,

[Hugh] Top secret.
Berlin, 10th November 1937.
The Führer began by explaining that the question is one of space.

Le Führer constata
que c'était une question d'espace.

translation.en: The German race comprises over 85 million,

La race allemande comprend
plus de 85 millions de personnes,

translation.en: and this constitutes a more tightly-packed racial community than any other country.
translation.fr:
ce qui constitue une communauté raciale
plus dense que n'importe quel autre pays.

L'unique solution est l'acquisition

translation.en: [in German] How's your afternoon, Herr von Hartmann?
Arduous, Frau Winter. And yours?
Well, I'm hanging in there.
-Did you meet with your English friend? -I did.

- Tu as vu ton ami anglais ?
- Oui.

translation.en: -And? -And we'll see.
Did something happen?
Yes, you could say that.
We have an agreement.
An agreement for the immediate handover of the Sudetenland…

translation.en: [in Italian] Congratulations, Schmidt. Excellent work.
Thank you.
[in German] …to the German Empire.
We'll get everything we wanted.

Je croyais
