translation.en: He wanted to wear down the Führer with the smallest details.
translation.fr: Il voulait parler des moindres détails.

translation.en: -The man is a bean counter. -Have they signed already?
What? The treaties are being drawn up right now. They'll sign after dinner.
translation.fr:
On rédige les traités.
Ils signeront après le dîner.

translation.en: And straighten your tie.
The two of us have been invited to the dining room with the Führer.
translation.fr:
Nous avons été invités
à manger avec le Führer.

translation.en: -Oh, God. -What, "Oh, God"? Von Hartmann.
Herr von Hartmann, that's a great honour.
-Yes. -Quite right, Fräulein…
-Frau Winter. -Frau Winter.
Anyway, the English and the French aren't staying for dinner.
translation.fr:
Les Anglais et les Français
ne restent pas dîner.

translation.en: They've lost their appetite.
-So we were asked to fill the ranks. -[man] Dr. Schmidt!
translation.fr:
- Nous allons les remplacer.
- Dr Schmidt !

translation.en: Well, looks like I'm needed again.
translation.fr: On dirait qu'on a besoin de moi.

translation.en: -[in English] A narrow escape. -Thank you.
The Führer is vegetarian. Insists on meat not being served anywhere.
translation.fr:
Le Führer est végétarien.
Aucune viande n'est servie.

translation.en: -Does he? -Yes.
When I was at lunch at the Chancellery with all the high command,
translation.fr:
À la Chancellerie, avec le haut commandement,
on a eu des escalopes de céleri.

translation.en: -they served Sellerieschnitzel. -[snorts]
translation.fr:
avec le haut commandement,
on a eu des escalopes de céleri.

translation.en: -Musso will have enjoyed that. -Yes, wouldn't he just?
translation.fr:
- Musso aura apprécié.
- Oui, n'est-ce pas ?

translation.en: And afterward, I'm telling you, I went to a butcher's shop nearby.
translation.fr:
Juste après, je suis allé
à la boucherie acheter

translation.en: -Ordered two huge sausages. -Could be Wurst.
Yes. And I was just leaving the butcher's shop,
translation.fr:
Et alors que je sortais de la boucherie,
qui est entré ?

translation.en: when who should be coming in but Hermann Göring,
translation.fr:
Et alors que je sortais de la boucherie,
qui est entré ? Hermann Göring.

translation.en: -with a hungry look on his face? -[laughing]
-He was as famished as I was. -Sir, I--
Yes, not now, Legat.
[in German] Don't drink too much, von Hartmann. Just wet your lips.
translation.fr: Ne buvez pas trop. Mouillez vos lèvres.

translation.en: We still have a lot of work ahead of us.
Tomorrow, the world will watch Munich and our translations.
translation.fr:
Demain, le monde regardera Munich
et nos traductions.

translation.en: Of course.
We can't afford any mistakes.
…he has some skill. He's not a bad negotiator.
translation.fr: Il a du talent. Il sait négocier.

translation.en: [Henderson, in English] Prime Minister, tomorrow morning,
millions of mothers will be blessing you
translation.fr: des millions de mères vous béniront

translation.en: for having saved their sons from the horror of war.
translation.fr:
d'avoir sauvé leurs fils
de l'horreur de la guerre.

translation.en: -Prime Minister. -[Chamberlain] Too kind.
-Can I have a word? -Not now.
-It's rather urgent. -Legat!
You really should go and rest before the signing, Neville.
translation.fr:
Vous devriez vous reposer
avant la signature.

translation.en: I think I will take forty winks.
translation.fr: Oui, je vais faire une sieste.

translation.en: -I sent a sandwich up to your room. -Thanks so much, Horace.
translation.fr:
- Un sandwich vous y attend.
- Merci beaucoup.

translation.en: Legat. Will you just give the man a moment to breathe?
translation.fr: Legat. Vous pouvez le laisser respirer ?

translation.en: -Yes. -He's very tired.
He's been up for 15 hours or more.
Yes, sir. Sorry.
Join us for supper.
All right.
-[in German] Excuse me. -Von Hartmann?
Where are you going?
Excuse me, my Führer. I'm needed for the translation of the agreement.
translation.fr:
Pardon, mon Führer.
Je dois aider à la traduction de l'accord.

translation.en: Come here.
I never forget a personal obligation.
translation.fr:
Je n'oublie jamais
un engagement personnel.

translation.en: For Germany,
I am prepared to be dishonest a thousand times over.
translation.fr: je suis prêt à mentir mille fois.

translation.en: For myself, never.
I'm no watch thief.
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas un voleur.

translation.en: Thank you, my Führer.
[Himmler] To the good health of our dear Italian friends.
translation.fr: À la santé de nos chers amis italiens.

translation.en: And to the Führer.
[all] To the Führer.
[Wilson, in English] One of the Italian delegates was saying how good the kitchen is.
translation.fr:
D'après un délégué italien,
la cuisine est bonne.

translation.en: -[Henderson] Yes, indeed, yes. -[Wilson] What do you recommend?
-[Henderson] I recommend the Hachsen. -[Wilson] What is that?
[Henderson] It's a pork knuckle. Very crispy.
translation.fr: Un jarret de porc. C'est croustillant.

translation.en: -Sir Horace! -Yes?
Would you mind if I joined you in a moment?
translation.fr: Je vous rejoins dans un instant.

translation.en: Yes, of course.
-Have you read it? -It's classified.
-If they find… -Have you spoken to Chamberlain?
translation.fr:
- S'ils découvrent…
- Tu as parlé à Chamberlain ?

translation.en: -Have you spoken to Chamberlain? -Keep your voice down!
translation.fr:
- S'ils découvrent…
- Tu as parlé à Chamberlain ? Moins fort ! Non, pas encore.

translation.en: -Thre's no linen. No linen. -[Hugh] Not yet.
You know they're about to sign?
It isn't an easy thing to raise with him.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas facile de lui parler.

translation.en: -Then I'll do it. -Oh, for God's sake! Don't be stupid.
translation.fr:
- Je vais le faire.
- Ne sois pas idiot.

translation.en: This is the last moment. Do you understand?
I won't have it on my conscience that I did nothing!
translation.fr: Je refuse de ne rien faire !

translation.en: -I feel the same. As soon as I can-- -No, no.
translation.fr:
Moi non plus.
Dès que je peux, je lui parle.

translation.en: -I'll talk to him. -Not soon, now!
translation.fr:
Moi non plus.
Dès que je peux, je lui parle. - Faisons-le ensemble.
- Non !

translation.en: -Let's do it together. -No!
-Why not? We are on the edge. -Do you have any idea--
translation.fr: Pourquoi pas ? On est à bout.

translation.en: We are right on the edge.
Paul.
-I'm sorry. -What's happened to you?
We have to try, Hugh.
Please, we have to try.
This'll be the end of my career.
Where's the document?
In my room.
Come on.
[secretary] Is there another hotel nearby?
translation.fr: Il y a un autre hôtel ?

translation.en: Downtown. I will call it. I will call.
Thank you, that would be great.
In the meantime, if we can get some linen so we can have a shower,
translation.fr:
Si nous pouvions
prendre une douche en attendant,

translation.en: that would be amazing.
Listen.
He's old, and he's exhausted.
I'll give him the document, and if he agrees to see you,
translation.fr:
Je lui donne le document
et s'il consent à te voir,

translation.en: for God's sake, don't give him a moral lecture.
translation.fr: je t'en prie, ne le sermonne pas.

translation.en: -Just the facts. -All right.
Wait here.
Oh, sorry, Prime Minister.
No, no, no, no. Come on in, Legat. Just having my blood pressure checked.
translation.fr:
Non. Entrez, Legat.
Je vérifie simplement ma tension.

translation.en: Fortunately, it looks as if I'll live another day.
translation.fr: On dirait que je vais vivre un autre jour.

translation.en: -Good night. -Good night, Joseph. Thank you.
translation.fr:
- Bonne nuit.
- Bonne nuit, Joseph. Merci.

translation.en: So what is it that can't wait? Hm?
We've come into possession of a significant document.
And who is "we"?
I have come into possession of a document.
What is it?
The minutes of a meeting that Hitler held with his senior commanders last November.
translation.fr:
Le procès-verbal d'une réunion
qu'Hitler a tenue en novembre dernier,

translation.en: A meeting in which he explicitly commits himself to a war of conquest.
translation.fr: où il s'engage à une guerre de conquête.

translation.en: Obviously, it's all in German,
translation.fr:
C'est en allemand.
Je crois qu'il est légitime.

translation.en: but I believe it to be legitimate and truthful.
translation.fr:
C'est en allemand.
Je crois qu'il est légitime. Et véridique.

translation.en: And how did this document come to us?
A friend gave it to me in strict confidence.
-Friend? -A German diplomat.
Why does he wish us to have it?
I think he should explain that himself. He's waiting outside.
translation.fr:
Il devrait vous l'expliquer lui-même.
Il attend dehors.

translation.en: -Does Sir Horace know about this? -No, sir.
translation.fr:
- Sir Horace est au courant ?
- Non, monsieur.

translation.en: Nobody knows.
You're exceeding your authority, young man.
[scoffs] I can't possibly meet with a German diplomat.
translation.fr: Je ne peux pas voir un diplomate allemand.

translation.en: I understand, but he is risking his life to see you.
translation.fr: Je comprends, mais il risque sa vie.

translation.en: No…
This is… most improper.
I'm aware, sir.
Right.
Three minutes. Not a moment longer.
You've got three minutes.
This is Paul von Hartmann of the German Foreign Ministry.
translation.fr: Paul von Hartmann, du ministère allemand.

translation.en: -How do you do? -Thank you for seeing me.
I'm not sure it's very wise. For either of us.
translation.fr:
Je doute que ce soit très avisé.
Pour nous deux.

translation.en: Take a seat. Close the door, Legat.
You better come and join us, Legat. Come on.
So, get on with it.
That document is proof that Hitler is lying
translation.fr: Ce document est la preuve qu'Hitler ment

translation.en: when he claims to have no further territorial demands.
translation.fr:
quand il dit ne pas avoir
d'autres demandes territoriales.

translation.en: On the contrary, he wants to expand the country,
translation.fr:
Au contraire, il veut plus d'espace pour le pays
et continuera à s'étendre.

translation.en: and he will keep on expanding.
translation.fr:
il veut plus d'espace pour le pays
et continuera à s'étendre.

translation.en: Therefore, I beg you not to sign the agreement tonight.
translation.fr: Je vous demande de ne pas signer l'accord.

translation.en: [laughing] What?
Prime Minister.
Adolf Hitler is a monster.
He is a madman.
You cannot give him what he wants. He'll take more and more land.
translation.fr:
Vous ne pouvez rien lui donner.
Il en voudra toujours plus.

translation.en: More and more people will suffer.
translation.fr: De plus en plus de gens souffriront.

translation.en: That is the proof.
I applaud your courage, young man.
translation.fr: Je salue votre courage, jeune homme.

translation.en: But I have to give you a lesson in political reality.
translation.fr: Mais la réalité politique est toute autre.

translation.en: The people of Great Britain will never take up arms over a local border dispute.
translation.fr:
Le peuple britannique
ne prendra jamais les armes pour un conflit frontalier.

translation.en: -It's so much more than a local border-- -As for what Hitler may do
translation.fr: C'est bien plus que ça. Quant à ce qu'Hitler pourrait faire,

translation.en: or may not do in the future, well, we shall have to wait and see.
translation.fr:
ou non, à l'avenir,
nous attendrons de voir.

translation.en: -Wait and see is not-- -My sole objective here
translation.fr:
Ce n'est pas… Mon seul objectif est
d'éviter la guerre à court terme

translation.en: is to avert war in the immediate term,
translation.fr:
Mon seul objectif est
d'éviter la guerre à court terme

translation.en: so I can begin to build a lasting peace.
translation.fr: pour essayer d'établir une paix durable.

translation.en: -There will be no lasting peace. -But I have to try!
translation.fr: Il n'y aura pas de paix durable. Mais je dois essayer !

translation.en: Look, the worst thing I could do is to walk away from this conference.
translation.fr:
La pire faute que je pourrais commettre
serait de quitter cette conférence.

translation.en: If you do, there are people waiting, high up in the military,
translation.fr:
Si vous le faites,
des membres du haut commandement,

translation.en: a resistance, to bring him down.
-Well, why haven't they done so already? -They will if--
I can't rely on some resistance
translation.fr: Je ne peux pas compter sur une résistance

translation.en: you may believe exists in the German army.
translation.fr:
dont vous soupçonnez l'existence
dans l'armée allemande.

translation.en: Well, I…
think you should…
take this back to wherever it came from.
translation.fr: Vous devriez le remettre à sa place.

translation.en: No.
Keep it. Study it.
That is the political reality.
Now you're being impertinent.
And you are shaking hands with a man who hates everything you stand for!
translation.fr:
Vous serrez la main de l'homme
qui déteste ce que vous représentez !

translation.en: He is lying to you. He will go further and further.
translation.fr: Il vous ment. Il n'en aura jamais assez.

translation.en: He will not stop, sir. He will never sto--
Thank you for your time.
Please don't sign the agreement.
Get rid of this.
I have to say, Legat,
I'm extremely disappointed in you.
-[in English] Prime Minister. -[Chamberlain] Ah. Nice to see you.
Oh, Monsieur Daladier. Did you get some dinner?
[in German] There they are.
…the Czechs aren't here, given the circumstances.
translation.fr:
… les Tchèques sont absents
vu les circonstances.

translation.en: Um… Oh, there's Monsieur Daladier. I want to--
-[in English] Sorry, we we both speaking. -[Chamberlain] Um, um… un sandwich?
translation.fr: Pardon, nous allions parler en même temps.

translation.en: -À tout à l'heure. -[man] It is very exciting…
[in German] Are you looking for someone?
Yes, thank you. About the arrangements for the press?
translation.fr: Oui, merci. En ce qui concerne la presse.

translation.en: Who's responsible for that?
Enjoy the rest of your stay in Munich, Mr. Legat.
translation.fr: Profitez bien de votre séjour, M. Legat.

translation.en: [in English] Oh bloody hell.
[in German] What did you want from him?
Can a British photographer be at the signing?
translation.fr: On peut avoir un photographe britannique ?

translation.en: No chance.
Only the Führer's personal photographer has permission to take pictures.
translation.fr:
Seul le photographe du Führer
peut prendre des photos.

translation.en: [in English] I'm sorry if I embarrassed you tonight.
translation.fr: Je suis désolé pour ce soir.

translation.en: I'm the one who should apologise.
What have you done with the document?
I will take it to London, find a more responsive audience.
translation.fr:
Je trouverai
un public plus réactif à Londres.

translation.en: It won't be a waste.
translation.fr: Ça n'aura pas été pour rien.

translation.en: -[man, in German] Gentlemen! -We should stop talking.
[Schmidt, in English] The Führer is pleased to invite you back to the library for the signing ceremony.
translation.fr:
Le Führer vous invite à la bibliothèque
pour la cérémonie de signature.

translation.en: -Prime Minister. -[Chamberlain] Good.
Duce, Monsieur Président du Conseil, Excellencies, gentlemen.
translation.fr:
Duce, Monsieur le président du conseil,
Vos Excellences, messieurs.

translation.en: Please, this way.
Who's there?
[Paul] Open the door.
I want to show you something.
Now?
It's the only time we have.
Give me two minutes.
[Paul] You can talk to her.
She won't respond, but maybe she can hear.
translation.fr:
Elle ne répondra pas,
mais elle entend peut-être.

translation.en: Lena?
[in German] It's me, Hugh.
[in English] What happened?
We split up.
After your trip to Munich.
How did she end up here?
She was arrested at a protest in '35
translation.fr: Elle a été arrêtée à une manif en 1935

translation.en: and sent to Moringen, the women's camp.
translation.fr:
et envoyée à Moringen,
le camp des femmes.

translation.en: When they discovered she was Jewish…
translation.fr: Quand ils ont appris qu'elle était juive…

translation.en: they were rough.
They said she fell out of a window.
I'm sure she did.
But not before they carved a Star of David onto her back.
translation.fr:
Ils lui avaient gravé
une étoile de David dans le dos.

translation.en: I knew he was racist.
All the awful Jewish stuff, I thought it could be put to one side.
translation.fr:
Ces trucs juifs, je pensais
qu'on pouvait les mettre de côté.

translation.en: How?
But you can't put it aside.
If they are capable of that, they are capable of anything.
translation.fr:
S'ils sont capables de ça,
ils sont capables de tout.

translation.en: Lena knew that.
Yes, she did.
May I?
Shall we share?
What will you do?
Carry on.
In a few hours, I have to present a press summary to Hitler.
translation.fr:
Je dois présenter
le compte rendu de la presse à Hitler.

translation.en: I'm told he's taken a shine to me.
Maybe it's a chance to really do something.
translation.fr:
C'est peut-être l'occasion
de vraiment faire quelque chose.

translation.en: What do you…
-How? -It would solve everything.
They'd kill you for even thinking about it.
translation.fr: Ils te tueraient pour y avoir pensé.

translation.en: I have a pistol.
I might get a moment alone with him.
translation.fr: Si je suis seul avec lui…

translation.en: Stop it!
Don't be stupid.
I'll take the document to London. It will make a difference.
Probably more talking, yes.
-Yes, more talking. -I have to fight.
You don't have to fight!
We don't choose the times we live in.
translation.fr:
On ne choisit pas
l'époque à laquelle on vit.

translation.en: The only choice we have is how we respond.
translation.fr: Notre seul choix, c'est comment on réagit.

translation.en: -You don't have to fight, Paul! We don't. -I have to fight. -We need to talk! We need to-- -I… have to fight!
translation.fr:
- Tu n'es pas obligé ! On doit parler !
- Je dois me battre !

translation.en: -No, you don't! No! -No! It's my responsibility! Understand?
translation.fr:
- Non !
- C'est ma responsabilité ! Tu comprends ?

translation.en: -Your responsibility? -Or I may as well blow my brains out.
translation.fr: Sinon, autant me tirer une balle.

translation.en: There are other ways of doing things! Talk, discussion--
translation.fr: On a les pourparlers, les discussions…

translation.en: -There's no other things, no. -There's always hope!
translation.fr:
- Non.
- Il y a toujours de l'espoir !

translation.en: [sighs] Hoping is waiting for someone else to do it.
translation.fr:
Espérer, c'est attendre
qu'un autre agisse.

translation.en: We'd all be much better off without it.
I'd miss you.
Goodbye.
Goodbye.
-Hello. -Hello.
Bit early for a walk.
Yes.
I-- I couldn't sleep. I had to clear my head.
translation.fr:
Je ne pouvais pas dormir.
Je devais me vider la tête.

translation.en: Are you all right?
-Why are you standing out here? -I'm looking for you.
translation.fr:
- Que faites-vous là ?
- Je vous cherchais.

translation.en: The PM's awake, and he wants to see you.
-I heard you were looking for me, sir. -Ah! Legat. Good morning.
Don't suppose you brought that copy of The Times with…
translation.fr:
Vous n'auriez pas apporté
l'exemplaire du Times

translation.en: with Hitler's speech in it, did you?
translation.fr: avec le discours d'Hitler, par hasard ?

translation.en: Yes, sir. I put it in your box, sir.
translation.fr: Je l'ai mis dans votre boîte.

translation.en: Oh, good man. Can you find it for me?
Had a word with him last night.
translation.fr: Je lui ai parlé hier soir.

translation.en: Asked if I might see him again this morning before we fly back.
translation.fr: J'ai demandé à le voir ce matin.

translation.en: -[Hugh] Asked who, sir? -Herr Hitler.
Did-- did he agree?
[chuckles] Couldn't really refuse.
translation.fr: Il n'a pas eu le choix.

translation.en: Must say, that was a remarkably rude young man you brought to see me last night.
translation.fr:
Vous m'avez présenté
à un homme très impoli hier soir.

translation.en: -I really am sorry about that, sir. -Ah, thank you.
-Have you told anyone about it? -No.
Good. Neither have I.
His arguments were naive,
but… they were not ineffective.
Now, here we are.
Listen, I'd like you to take this to Wilson.
Ask him to turn it into a short statement of intent.
translation.fr:
Demandez-lui d'en faire
une courte déclaration d'intention.

translation.en: Just from there to there.
Sir, I don't follow.
Well, on Monday night, Hitler publicly declared his desire
translation.fr:
Eh bien, lundi soir,
Hitler a déclaré publiquement son désir

translation.en: for a permanent peace between Germany and Great Britain.
translation.fr: d'une paix permanente entre nos deux pays.

translation.en: -Yes. -Well, I'd like his undertaking redrafted.
translation.fr:
- Oui.
- J'aimerais que l'engagement soit écrit.

translation.en: -In the form of a joint statement. -A joint statement?
To which both he and I can put our names this morning.
translation.fr: Que nous signerons tous les deux ce matin.

translation.en: Oh, get on with it. Go on. Get it done.
And get yourself a coffee. You're half awake.
translation.fr:
Et prenez un café.
Vous avez l'air endormi.

translation.en: "We regard the agreement signed last night
as symbolic of the desire of our two peoples
translation.fr:
"comme étant le symbole
du désir de nos deux peuples

translation.en: never to go to war with one another again."
translation.fr: "de ne plus jamais entrer en guerre."

translation.en: I hope the PM realises this has no legal force whatsoever.
translation.fr:
Le PM sait
que ça n'a aucune valeur juridique ?

translation.en: -The man's not a fool. -What the hell's he playing at?
translation.fr:
- Il n'est pas stupide.
- À quoi il joue ?

translation.en: I've no idea. First I heard of it was half an hour ago.
translation.fr:
Je n'en sais rien.
Je viens de l'apprendre.

translation.en: -Do you have it? -[Wilson] Yes.
-Good. -It may be a little long.
-What if he refuses to sign it? -[Chamberlain] Why should he?
translation.fr:
- Et s'il refuse de signer ?
- Pourquoi ?

translation.en: These are all statements he's made already.
[Wilson] It doesn't mean he's going to stick with them.
translation.fr: Rien ne dit qu'il va s'y tenir.

translation.en: It's symbolic, Horace.
Last night's agreement only settles a tiny dispute.
translation.fr:
L'accord d'hier ne règle
qu'un petit conflit.

translation.en: There will be others.
And I want him to publicly commit himself to peace.
translation.fr:
Et je veux
qu'il s'engage publiquement pour la paix.

translation.en: Oh, Legat, make sure there's a car available at 11:00.
translation.fr: Legat, demandez une voiture pour 11 h.

translation.en: To the Führerbau?
No. Ah, you've put my name before his. It should be the other way around.
translation.fr:
Non. Vous avez mis mon nom en premier.
Ça devrait être l'inverse.

translation.en: Otherwise, good.
Yes, I wanted to have a private meeting with him.
Man to man, no officials.
-He invited me to his apartment. -What?
translation.fr:
- Il m'a invité chez lui.
- Comment ?

translation.en: -No officials? -Not even you, Horace.
Oh, for God's sake. You can't go and see Hitler entirely on your own.
translation.fr:
Mais vous ne pouvez pas
aller voir Hitler tout seul.

translation.en: Can and will.
translation.fr: Je le peux et je le ferai.

translation.en: Gentlemen, we must rise to the level of events.
translation.fr:
Messieurs, élevons-nous
à la hauteur des événements.

translation.en: What? Hey!
[in German] What are you doing here?
I mean, what the hell are you doing here in Munich?
What are you doing here in Munich? What's going on here?
translation.fr: Que faites-vous ici ? Que se passe-t-il ?

translation.en: What is going on here? Talk to me!
I don't know--
Now, let's talk. Come on. Talk to me!
I would suggest you go back where you came from.
translation.fr: Je vous suggère de rentrer chez vous.

translation.en: Legat. [spits]
Paul.
[Chamberlain] It was a specific point.
A bit of an embarrassment. Well, why was there…
translation.fr: Un peu gênant. Eh bien, pourquoi…

translation.en: [Wilson] With respect to-- There just is. I can't explain it any more.
translation.fr:
Sauf votre respect…
Je ne peux pas l'expliquer.

translation.en: -Prime Minister? -Yes?
-I should accompany you to the meeting. -No.
I thought I had made this perfectly clear. No officials.
translation.fr:
Je pensais avoir été très clair.
Pas d'officiels.

translation.en: Not as an official, sir. As a translator.
No, I want him to feel this is a personal meeting.
You need someone there to make sure your words are accurately reported.
translation.fr:
Vos paroles doivent
être rendues avec précision.

translation.en: -I-- -Remember what happened at Berchtesgaden -when he refused to give us a copy… -No, that--
translation.fr:
À Berchtesgaden,
il avait refusé de nous communiquer…

translation.en: You can't trust Schmidt to have your back.
translation.fr: Ne faites pas confiance à Schmidt.

translation.en: I think a translator could be useful.
-I'm the only one who speaks German. -All right, all right, all right!
translation.fr: Je suis le seul à parler allemand. Très bien !

translation.en: You can come, but be discreet.
Keep out of his eyeline. And mine.
translation.fr:
Tenez-vous à l'écart
de nos champs de vision.

translation.en: -[reporters clamouring] -Mr. Chamberlain!
-Mr. Chamberlain! -Mr. Chamberlain!
[man] Good morning, Prime Minister.
-This way, sir. -Morning.
-[officer] Your wardrobe. -[whispers] They have the document.
-[Schmidt] Good morning. -[Chamberlain] Good morning.
-[Schmidt] Did you sleep well? -[Chamberlain] Very well.
translation.fr:
- Vous avez bien dormi ?
- Très bien.

translation.en: [Schmidt] I'm pleased to hear that, sir.
[Chamberlain] We, the German Führer and British Prime Minister,
translation.fr:
Nous, le Führer allemand
et le Premier ministre britannique,

translation.en: are agreed in respect of the future of Anglo-German relations.
translation.fr:
sommes d'accord sur l'avenir
des relations anglo-allemandes.

translation.en: We regard the agreement signed last night
translation.fr: Nous considérons l'accord signé hier soir

translation.en: as symbolic of the desire of our two peoples
translation.fr:
comme étant le symbole
du désir de nos deux peuples

translation.en: never to go to war with one another again.
translation.fr: de ne jamais entrer à nouveau en guerre.

translation.en: We are determined to continue to remove possible sources of difference
translation.fr:
Nous sommes déterminés à faire disparaître
les sources possibles de différends

translation.en: and to contribute to the peace of Europe.
translation.fr:
et à contribuer
à assurer la paix en Europe.

translation.en: [in English] Prime Minister, I would like to thank you explicitly.
translation.fr:
M. le Premier ministre,
je tiens à vous remercier.

translation.en: [Schmidt, in English] I will accompany you back to your hotel.
translation.fr: Je vais vous raccompagner à votre hôtel.

translation.en: Thank you, Herr Hitler.
And may I add
that there was never a doubt in my mind, sir,
translation.fr: que je n'ai jamais douté une seule seconde

translation.en: as to the lengths to which you would go to protect Germany.
translation.fr:
des efforts que vous feriez
pour protéger l'Allemagne.

translation.en: [officer, in German] The foreign press summary!
[in English] Thank you. Come along, Legat.
[man, in German] The Reichsführer is arriving.
Please excuse me, my Führer.
[Hitler] "The cheers for Hitler were mechanical and polite."
translation.fr:
"Les acclamations en faveur d'Hitler
étaient mécaniques et polies,

translation.en: "For Chamberlain, they were ecstatic."
You, as an educated German, what do you think? Are they right?
translation.fr:
En tant qu'Allemand cultivé,
qu'en pensez-vous ? Ils ont raison ?

translation.en: I do not wish to be followed mechanically!
translation.fr: Je ne veux pas être suivi mécaniquement !

translation.en: I gave Germany back its dignity.
translation.fr: J'ai rendu à l'Allemagne sa dignité.

translation.en: Is it too much to ask for a little gratitude?
translation.fr:
Je ne demande
qu'un peu de reconnaissance !

translation.en: "Mechanical."
They're grateful to this arsehole Chamberlain!
translation.fr: Ils remercient ce con de Chamberlain !

translation.en: Am I the only one who realises that we have a historic task ahead of us?
translation.fr:
Suis-je le seul à comprendre
qu'une tâche historique nous attend ?

translation.en: That this is the moment for Germany to fulfil its destiny?
translation.fr:
Que c'est le moment pour l'Allemagne
d'accomplir son destin ?

translation.en: Speak. I want you to answer me.
Why aren't they grateful?
The people don't want a war. They're afraid.
translation.fr:
Le peuple ne veut pas la guerre.
Il a peur.

translation.en: The people don't know what they want.
translation.fr: Il ne sait pas ce qu'il veut.

translation.en: They're children.
But you're right. They are afraid.
translation.fr: Mais vous avez raison. Il a peur.

translation.en: I am surrounded by cowardice.
Yes, my Führer.
I told you, I can read people.
translation.fr: Je vous ai dit que je cernais les gens.

translation.en: You say yes,
but your eyes…
are saying no.
It's just you and I here.
translation.fr: Il n'y a que vous et moi, ici.

translation.en: So…
what are you thinking, von Hartmann?
What do you…
want to say to me?
Nothing.
Heil, my Führer.
I'm told you've signed another agreement with Chamberlain?
translation.fr:
Vous avez signé
un autre accord avec Chamberlain ?

translation.en: Don't take that so seriously. That piece of paper is of no significance.
translation.fr:
Ne prenez pas ça au sérieux.
Ce papier n'a aucune importance.

translation.en: The problem lies here, with the German people.
translation.fr:
Le problème est ici,
avec le peuple allemand.

translation.en: Anything else?
Thank you.
For…
this.
Thank you.
[in English] I hope you don't mind. They asked me to share a ride to the airport.
translation.fr:
Ça ne vous dérange pas ?
Je dois partager la voiture.

translation.en: I'm glad to have a moment alone with you.
translation.fr: Je suis contente de vous voir.

translation.en: I haven't been altogether straight with you.
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas été honnête avec vous.

translation.en: No?
No. I'm actually something of a guardian angel.
translation.fr: Non. Je suis une sorte d'ange gardien.

translation.en: What on earth are you talking about?
In London, you asked my surname.
It's Menzies.
I think you know my uncle. He's a colonel in the Foreign Office.
translation.fr:
Vous devez connaître mon oncle.
Un colonel.

translation.en: Well, he asked me to keep an eye on you out here.
translation.fr: Il m'a demandé de vous surveiller.

translation.en: Thank goodness I did.
I took it from your room last night when you went off with your friend.
translation.fr: Je l'ai pris dans votre chambre hier soir.

translation.en: I think other parties were trying to find it this morning?
translation.fr:
Je crois qu'une personne
l'a cherché, ce matin ?

translation.en: [in German] I assume you're waiting for me?
No, actually.
No?
Not today, Paulie. Not today, but soon. Very soon.
translation.fr:
Pas aujourd'hui, Paulie.
Mais bientôt. Très bientôt.

translation.en: Well, then.
-My regards-- -Get out.
[in English] Thank you.
Thank you, thank you.
Thank you, thank you, thank you.
-Thank-- -Enough!
Smoke?
Yes.
[Wilson] Sir.
Sir, we'll be on the ground in half an hour.
My God, I… fell asleep. Ooh.
translation.fr: Mon Dieu, je me suis endormi.

translation.en: Apparently, there's quite a crowd.
translation.fr: Apparemment, il y a du monde.

translation.en: The King has asked you to go direct to Buckingham Palace
translation.fr:
Le roi demande à vous voir
au palais de Buckingham

translation.en: so their Majesties can thank you in person.
Oh, God.
I shall have to speak to the cameras.
The world doesn't yet know about our joint statement.
translation.fr:
Le monde ne sait rien
de notre déclaration commune.

translation.en: Prime Minister, I urge you
to treat the undertaking given by Hitler with the utmost caution.
translation.fr:
je vous demande de prendre
l'engagement d'Hitler avec prudence.

translation.en: -Ah… -The agreement on the Sudetenland
translation.fr:
L'accord sur les Sudètes
est une chose, mais…

translation.en: -is one thing, but this other document-- -Yes, I know. Horace, look.
translation.fr:
L'accord sur les Sudètes
est une chose, mais… Oui, je sais. Horace, écoutez.

translation.en: If there's one thing I've learned from my dealings with Mr. Hitler,
translation.fr:
Si j'ai appris une chose
de mes tractations avec M. Hitler,

translation.en: it's that you can't play poker with a gangster
translation.fr:
c'est de ne pas jouer au poker
avec un gangster

translation.en: without any cards up your sleeve.
translation.fr: si l'on n'a pas de jeu.

translation.en: What if he breaks his word? You'll look like a fool.
translation.fr:
S'il ne tient pas parole,
vous serez l'idiot.

translation.en: Well, if he breaks his word, the world will see him for who he truly is!
translation.fr:
Dans ce cas, le monde le verra
sous son vrai jour !

translation.en: And it'll unite the Allies. Might even bring the Americans on board.
translation.fr:
Ça unira les Alliés
et peut-être même les Américains.

translation.en: And if I'm made to look a fool, well, it's a small price to pay.
translation.fr:
Passer pour un idiot
sera un petit prix à payer.

translation.en: Horace, I can only play the game with the cards I've been dealt.
translation.fr:
Horace, je ne peux jouer
qu'avec les cartes qu'on m'a données.

translation.en: What do you think, Legat? Do you think this will change the game?
translation.fr:
Qu'en pensez-vous, Legat ?
Ça va changer la donne ?

translation.en: I think there's a chance, Prime Minister.
So do I.
[Wilson] Look at that, Legat.
You'd think we won a war rather than avoided one.
translation.fr:
On pourrait croire
qu'on a gagné une guerre.

translation.en: There are thousands of people gathering on the Mall.
translation.fr: Des milliers de personnes sont sorties.

translation.en: Welcome back, sir. Congratulations.
[Wilson] The King intends to take him out onto the balcony.
translation.fr: Le roi ira sur le balcon avec lui.

translation.en: The settlement of the Czechoslovakian problem,
which has been achieved…
…uh, is in my mind
merely a prelude to a larger settlement,
translation.fr: qu'un prélude à un accord plus large,

translation.en: which, for all Europe,
may bring peace.
For this morning…
this morning I had another talk…
…with the German Chancellor Herr Hitler.
translation.fr: avec le chancelier allemand, Herr Hitler.

translation.en: Here is the paper
which bears his name upon it as well as mine.
translation.fr: qui porte sa signature et la mienne.

translation.en: -Hello. -[sighs]
-Hello. -Hello.
Where's Arthur?
[sniffles] He's in the garden. He'll be happy to see you.
translation.fr: Dehors. Il sera content de te voir.

translation.en: I'm sorry for the way I left.
And, uh…
I wanted to say…
you were right.
I have felt disappointed.
And it's my fault, not yours.
translation.fr: C'est ma faute, pas la tienne.

translation.en: But there are some things I want to change.
translation.fr: Mais je veux changer certaines choses.

translation.en: I think I might resign from the service.
And do what?
When war comes, I need to be…
translation.fr: Pendant la guerre, je dois être

translation.en: useful.
Don't laugh, but I think I might join the RAF.
translation.fr:
Oui. Ne ris pas.
Je vais m'engager dans la RAF.

translation.en: What about the treaty? I thought he just said that--
translation.fr: Et le traité ? Il vient de dire…

translation.en: Just a delay. The PM's given us a chance of winning the damn thing when it happens.
translation.fr:
C'est provisoire. Le PM nous a donné
une chance de gagner.

translation.en: It's quite some service when you think about it.
translation.fr: Il nous a rendu un sacré service.

translation.en: But it's coming.
Sooner or later.
One day soon, we will have to fight. And we will have to win.
translation.fr:
Bientôt, on devra se battre.
Et on devra gagner.

translation.en: There must be something else that you can do.
translation.fr: Il doit y avoir une autre solution.

translation.en: -More talks, negotiations-- -There's no other way.
Don't say that.
There's always hope.
Yes.
And we'd all be much better off without it.
translation.fr: Et on serait tous mieux sans.

translation.en: -[running] -[Arthur] Daddy!
Here. Come here. Up a squeak.
Oh, I've missed you.
[in German] I could have shot Hitler.
I was so close to him, I could smell his breath.
translation.fr:
J'étais si près
que je sentais son haleine.

translation.en: I could feel the gun in my hand.
But my hand wouldn't move.
Do you know why?
What would give me the right?
Do you want to keep going?
What other choice do we have?
They'll hang you for that one day.
translation.fr: Ils te pendront pour ça, un jour.

translation.en: I know.
-♪ Turn to promises… ♪ -[Lena, in English] I'll take it.
-♪ You dream of summer… ♪ -Oh, you speak Russian as well, right?
♪ Of hearing bluebells chime ♪ ♪ Your golden locks ♪ -♪ Drenched in moonlight… ♪ -[ball-goers cheering]
translation.fr:
LA PAIX ENTRE LA GRANDE-BRETAGNE
ET L'ALLEMAGNE N'A DURÉ QU'UN AN

translation.en: ♪ As we watch the birds fly by ♪ ♪ Come dance with me ♪
translation.fr:
NEVILLE CHAMBERLAIN A DÉMISSIONNÉ
DE SON POSTE DE PREMIER MINISTRE

translation.en: ♪ Into the dark blue night ♪
translation.fr:
NEVILLE CHAMBERLAIN A DÉMISSIONNÉ
DE SON POSTE DE PREMIER MINISTRE ET EST MORT QUELQUES MOIS APRÈS

translation.en: ♪ Into the dark blue night ♪
translation.fr:
LE DÉLAI OBTENU PAR CES ACCORDS A PERMIS À LA GRANDE-BRETAGNE
ET À SES ALLIÉS DE SE PRÉPARER

translation.en: ♪ You dream of summer ♪
translation.fr:
D'APRÈS LE ROMAN MUNICH
DE ROBERT HARRIS
